alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Campbell; Union (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 1:46PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Anderson, southeastern Campbell and western Union Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 246 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jacksboro, or near La Follette, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Follette, Jacksboro, Caryville, Rocky Top, Norris, Norris Dam State Park, Andersonville, Paulette, Big Ridge State Park and Sharps Chapel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
